title: Spinach, Gorgonzola and cranberry salad with raspberry walnut vinaigrette
ingredients: ['60g chopped walnuts', '1 500g bag spinach, torn into bite-size pieces', '60g dried cranberries', '70g crumbled Gorgonzola cheese', '2 tomatoes, chopped', '1 avocado - peeled, stone removed and diced', '1/2 red onion, thinly sliced', 'Vinaigrette', '2 tablespoons red raspberry jam (with seeds)', '2 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '5 tablespoons walnut oil', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
